English:
Hmm... What should I have today? Hot or iced?
Decisions, decisions...
Chinese:
嗯～今天要哪一個好呢
要冰的呢？　還是熱的呢，還是～？
Korean:
음~ 오늘은 어떤 걸로 할까.
아이스로 할까? 핫으로 할까, 아니면~?
German:
Hm ... Was will ich denn heute? Heiß oder
eisgekühlt? Die Qual der Wahl ...

English:
I've never heard of Mr. Navit. Is that a new type
of coffee?
Chinese:
什麼NAVIT聽都沒聽過。
那是新咖啡嗎？
Korean:
내빗씨 같은 건 들어본 적 없어.
그거, 새로 나온 커피 같은 거야?
German:
„Navit-san“ sagt mir gar nichts. Ist das eine neue
Kaffeemarke?

English:
On second thought, it doesn't sound like a type
of coffee...
Chinese: 乾脆不要選咖啡好像也不錯呢～
German:
Jetzt, wo ich es mir überlege, klingt es doch
nicht nach Kaffee ...
